page.title: 17 Beccles Childrens Clubs
page.content: Following a survey of our class we found that the town has a lot to offer young children. BOYS-There are at least 4 groups of Cubs to join.Many belonged to Mini Rugby and Waveney Tigers Football or St Benets Football. GIRLS-Several go to the June Glennie Dancing School and ride at Holton.There are some Brownie Packs to join. BOTH-Very popular is the Kingfishers Swimming Club and the Athletic Club.A few take piano lessons and even fewer go to Sunday School at either Hungate Methodist Church or St Michaels.Some go to the Library club which is held in the Gallery Room at the Library. Many children have won rosettes,cups, certificates or medals for their particular activity which encourages them to continue eagerly.
